snippet.title: The Smurfs (NES) Playthrough - NintendoComplete
snippet.description:
A playthrough of Infogrames' 1994 NES game, The Smurfs. 

This Smurfs was a pretty late-gen NES title, and was only produced for PAL territories. I was surprised when i learned that - I loved this game,  and I was surprised that it never came out here after we moved back to the states . As a little kid, I seem to remember The Smurfs appearing much more often on American TV than British. Of course, that might have been a consequence of having a whole four channels - the Spice Girls hadn't introduced the fifth yet lol). I think it's a bit sad that much of the world never got to see this, because this game is absolutely superb. 

It's a simple, no frills platformer that relies on super-precision jumping (and does it well), but the graphics are really excellent, and that soundtrack is the stuff of legends. 

Playing this again was a really happy throwback to my much younger self. To anyone who missed it the first time around,  give this a go. It deserves the chance!
____
No cheats were used during the recording of this video. 

NintendoComplete (http://www.nintendocomplete.com/) punches you in the face with in-depth reviews, screenshot archives, and music from classic 8-bit NES games!

Visit for the latest updates!
